mapper.insert: insert into reservation values( reservation_seq.nextval, #{reserStudent}, #{date}, #{reserKey}, TO_DATE(#{reserStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{reserEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
mapper.select: select reservation_no as reserNo, reservation_student as reserStudent, reservation_Date as date, reservation_key as reserKey, reservation_start as reserStart, reservation_end as reserEnd from reservation where reservation_student=22;

select reservation_no as reserNo, reservation_student as reserStudent, reservation_Date as date, reservation_key as reserKey, reservation_start as reserStart, reservation_end as reserEnd from reservation where reservation_student=23;

select reservation_no as reserNo, reservation_student as reserStudent, reservation_Date as date, reservation_key as reserKey, reservation_start as reserStart, reservation_end as reserEnd from reservation where reservation_student=24;
